items.sentence: Tom and Mary spent the weekend working on a jigsaw puzzle.
I wouldn\'t be here today if Tom hadn\'t asked me to come.
Are you sure you don\'t want to stay for a couple of days?
Are you sure you want to borrow Tom\'s car without asking?
Dr. Jackson is one of the leading cardiologists in Boston.
Eventually, Tom will tell me where he buried the treasure.
Every even number greater than 2 is the sum of two primes.
Tom didn\'t know why Mary needed to borrow thirty dollars.
Tom didn\'t seem surprised when I told him why I did that.
Tom doesn\'t believe Mary could do that without some help.
Tom doesn\'t have enough money to buy everything he needs.
I promised Tom and I really don\'t want to disappoint him.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will show up today.
In retrospect, Tom wishes he had spent more time studying.
Tom put new pedals on the bicycle that he rides to school.
Tom said he wanted to move his chair closer to the window.
Tom says he needs to talk to us about something important.
Tom isn\'t a good enough swimmer to swim across the river.
Tom isn\'t as good at speaking French as I thought he was.
Tom isn\'t the kind of person who loses his temper easily.
Tom isn\'t the only one who knows where Mary is right now.
Tom knew Mary wasn\'t happy, even though she said she was.
The police can\'t question Tom until his lawyer gets here.
Tom suggested to Mary that she offer John a cup of coffee.
Tom swept the floor with the new broom Mary had given him.
Tom thought the food Mary had prepared tasted pretty good.
Tom took some money out of his wallet and gave it to Mary.
The faster we rub our hands together, the warmer they get.
The math homework proved to be easier than I had expected.
The meeting was a little shorter than I expected it to be.
The meeting will be postponed till the 20th of this month.
Tom sat down on the park bench and began to read his book.
Tom sat under a tree, sketching something in his notebook.
Tom saw Mary across the room and went over to talk to her.
He\'s not the kind of person who always criticizes others.
I can honestly say this is the best coffee I\'ve ever had.
I can\'t think of anyone who hates you more than Tom does.
Don\'t believe people who claim that they know everything.
Almost everyone I know wants to go to tomorrow\'s concert.
Do you really think that if I could help you, I wouldn\'t?
Tom was diagnosed with autism when he was three years old.
Tom was fed up with having to repeat himself all the time.
Tom was gunned down on the sidewalk in front of his house.
Tom was just as surprised to see us as we were to see him.
I think that we should let Tom go to Australia by himself.
According to the chief of police, there were no survivors.
Are you certain it was Tom who showed Mary how to do that?
Are you certain it was Tom who taught Mary how to do that?
Are you going to see any of your friends over the weekend?
Tom\'s lawyer said that he couldn\'t put Tom on the stand.
